title: Butter Cookies | Eggless
content:
Baked Cookies: Butter cookies Servings: 12  Duration: 30 mins Butter cookies are basic cooking and these are tastier, easy to make with soft texture outside and crispy inside. Best option to make at a kid's party or at tea time, easy to munch at any time. They're eggless and baked cookies, I hope you will try this simplest recipe and enjoy the cookies! Let's start with Ingredients and follows the procedure Ingredients:
  • Butter - 113 grams - at room temperature
  • Salt - 1/4 tsp
  • Powdered granulated sugar - 4 tbsp
  • Custard powder - 1 tbsp
  • Baking powder - 1 tsp
  • Corn flour - 1 tbsp
  • Baking soda - 1/4 tsp
  • Vanilla essence - 1/2 tsp
  • All-purpose flour (maida) - 1 1/4 cups
  • Milk - 1 tbsp ( To apply on cookies)
Procedure:
  • In a deep mixing bowl, add butter, salt, powdered sugar
  • Combine well till it becomes creamier
  • Next add Custard powder, cornflour, baking soda, vanilla essence, and baking powder
  • Mix well
  • Then add all-purpose flour and combine well till it forms a smooth dough
  • Put dough on a silicon sheet or on butter paper
  • Roll it to a round shape, take a cookie cutter and press it on rolled dough
  • Prick with a fork
  • Arrange cookies on a silicon sheet and brush with milk
  • Bake them at 325 F/ 180 C for 25 mins
  • Take out from the oven, when done by using hand gloves
  • Let them become cool and then serve
  • Happy cooking and have a good day :-)
